activities: RAI provides employment screening and credential verification services for clients with respect to their prospective or current employees and clients. Personally identifiable information for employees and prospective employees is gathered in the EU with the data subject's consent. The information is then transferred to RAI in the US securely.  All data are stored on secure servers from which data can be retrieved only by RAI employees. The only recipients of the data, other than RAI and it's employees and subcontractors, are the clients for which the background data were collected.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: off and on-line, HR data and manually processed
recoursemech: We are registered with the BBB EU Safe Harbor Program.
